name: Procedure to register child support order of another state for modification
text:
PART III.  REGISTRATION AND MODIFICATION
OF CHILD SUPPORT ORDER
 
         A party or support enforcement agency seeking to modify, or to modify and enforce, a child support order issued in another state shall register that order in this State in the same manner provided in part I if the order has not been registered.  A petition for modification may be filed at the same time as a request for registration, or later.  The pleading must specify the grounds for modification. [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1]
